Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/71st
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted, due to a street blockage near Lafayette/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th Red Line, Lafayette, Vincennes, 75th and State, over normal route, due to a street blockage near Lafayette/71st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
